aboutMe: My name is Sihlandlo Makhumsha and I am a student at Life  Choices Coding Academy.

I was born in Cape Town on 01 December 2001, 4 years later moved to stay in the  rurals of the Eastern Cape with my grandmother who played a significant role in my life. I started my grade R there in 2007 then went to finish matric in 2019 then somehow after highschool I came back to the Western Cape. I always loved looking at different studies and their respective prospects. I applied at Life Choices in 2022 but I couldn't come to the bootcamp due to financial difficulties. This year I had to make sure at least I can come to the bootcamp and then try my best. Now I'm a beginner web developer willing to learn and unlearn where there's a need to.

testimonials.name: Matthew Brown
testimonials.text: Sihlandlo has shown remarkable dedication and enthusiasm in his journey as a beginner web developer. His relentless pursuit of knowledge and eagerness to learn new skills are truly commendable. I have no doubt that with his persistence, he will continue to grow and excel in the field.

testimonials.name: Gwiba Mabandla
testimonials.text: Sihlandlo is very bold and confident and shows it through his work and personality, he's not afraid to share his opinions and concerns in order to forge a solution to a problem.

testimonials.name: Ntando Mabuto
testimonials.text: Sihlandlo is a very committed hard worker and an inspiring person, it is always a pleasure working with him.

testimonials.name: Yonela Mangele
testimonials.text: Sihlandlo's commitment and dedication to his work is what inspires others to work harder. His radiant energy and constant smile is what makes it very comfortable to work with him.

testimonials.name: Taahir Du Toit
testimonials.text: Sihlandlo is one my closest friends as his determination to get things done constantly inspires me. He approaches problems in a creative way and makes sure the people that surround him are on the same level of understanding as he his. It has been a pleasure to work with you and I'm sure you will go on to do great things.

testimonials.name: Siphokuhle Nyana
testimonials.text: I have had the pleasure of working alongside Sihlandlo for the past and current month we have worked together , and I can confidently say that he is a phenomenal team player. His dedication to his work, attention to detail, and positive attitude have consistently impressed me. He always goes above and beyond to ensure the success of our projects and is a true asset to our team. I am grateful for the opportunity to collaborate with him and look forward to continuing to do so in the future.
